00012 #ifdef UTIL_MPI

00014 #endif
00015 
00016 namespace Util
00017 {
00018 
00019    /*
00020    * Constructor.
00021    */
00022    BoundaryEnsemble::BoundaryEnsemble(Type type)
00023     : pressure_(1.0),
00024       type_(type)
00025    {}
00026 
00027    /*
00028    * Set the pressure.
00029    */
00030    void  BoundaryEnsemble::setPressure(double pressure)
00031    {
00032       if (!isIsobaric()) {
00033     UTIL_THROW("Must be an isobaric ensemble");
00034       }
00035       pressure_ = pressure;
00036    }
00037 
00038    /*
00039    * Read the type and (if necessary) pressure from file.
00040    */
00041    void BoundaryEnsemble::readParam(std::istream& in)
00042    {
00043       readBegin(in, "BoundaryEnsemble");
00044       read<Type>(in, "type", type_);
00045       if (isIsobaric()) {
00046          read<double>(in, "pressure", pressure_);
00047       }
00048       readEnd(in);
00049    }
00050 
00051    /*
00052    * Extract an BoundaryEnsemble::Type from an istream as a string.
00053    */
00054    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, BoundaryEnsemble::Type &type)
00055    {
00056       std::string buffer;
00057       in >> buffer;
00058       if (buffer == "RIGID" || buffer == "rigid") {
00059          type = BoundaryEnsemble::RIGID;
00060       } else
00061       if (buffer == "ISOBARIC" || buffer == "isobaric") {
00062          type = BoundaryEnsemble::ISOBARIC;
00063       } else {
00064          UTIL_THROW("Invalid BoundaryEnsemble::Type value input");
00065       }
00066       return in;
00067    }
00068 
00069    /*
00070    * Insert a BoundaryEnsemble::Type to an ostream as a string.
00071    */
00072    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const BoundaryEnsemble::Type &type)
00073    {
00074       if (type == BoundaryEnsemble::RIGID) {
00075          out << "rigid";
00076       } else
00077       if (type == BoundaryEnsemble::ISOBARIC) {
00078          out << "isobaric";
00079       } else
00080       if (type == BoundaryEnsemble::UNKNOWN) {
00081          out << "unknown";
00082       }
00083       return out;
00084    }
00085 
00086    #ifdef UTIL_MPI

00090    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<BoundaryEnsemble>::type = MPI::BYTE;
00091    bool MpiTraits<BoundaryEnsemble>::hasType = false;
00092 
00096    MPI::Datatype MpiTraits<BoundaryEnsemble::Type>::type = MPI::INT;
00097    bool MpiTraits<BoundaryEnsemble::Type>::hasType = true;
00098 
00102    void BoundaryEnsemble::commitMpiType()
00103    {
00104       MpiStructBuilder builder;
00105       BoundaryEnsemble   object;
00106 
00107       builder.setBase(&object);
00108       builder.addMember(&object.pressure_, MPI::DOUBLE);
00109       builder.addMember(&object.type_, MPI::INT);
00110       builder.commit(MpiTraits<BoundaryEnsemble>::type);
00111       MpiTraits<BoundaryEnsemble>::hasType = true;
00112    }
00113    #endif
00114 
00115 }
00116 #endif
